title: SPARE
author: SPARE
created_time: November 26, 2023, 07:54:47 AMLast edit: November 26, 2023, 11:13:50 AM by SPARE
content: How many of These price tragets are realistically possible in 2025 ? Bitcoin (BTC) : $150,000  Ethereum (ETH) : $12,000   BNB (BNB)  : $1,500  XRP (XRP) : $7     Solana (SOL) : $500                Cardano (ADA) : $9      Dogecoin (DOGE) : $3      Polkadot (DOT): $200  Polygon (MATIC) : $10

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Almost all f the targets are possible with slight variations as per my personal opinion except for the XRP and Doge. As XRP has not breached it's previous ATH in last 5 and half years and it's too much of an time for any crypto to achieve it this I would say it won't ever breach it, Doge would be good around $1 if there are heavy hype and Elon Musk pull out some magic else difficult. All the other altcoins which you have mentioned has very much possibilities of going beyond the figure especially ETH and BNB (If there ar no further controversies like CZ's acceptance of the crime and getting involved in illegal activities).Solana just as to double from its previous ATH which is possible in the bullrun.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: BNB and Solana, Solana even more so in these two.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think the closest to reality there is btc, eth and and bnb. These two are massive coins that can make it possible to gain new ATH. Well bitcoin might go there but the valuation is too high maybe a $100k would be a perfect prediction to that and 10k for eth and as is for bnb. Most projects could be a game changer and other alts in the list might go as well provided that these three first will do the prediction figure and any tokens will follow suit.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: The price target OP mentioned is realistic expect SOL and DOT. The issue with sol is that its ATH was heavily manipulated by FTX so right now its real price is reflecting in the market. Also there will be a massive token unlock schedule in the next year i think which is owned by FTX. So it is also possible that FTX will sell off those tokens to compensate their customers which will put massive selling pressure on them. Dot is having the same scenario that it also has massive token unlock schedule and DOT also lose its hype from the market as well.

comments.author: Tipstar
comments.body: Quote from: kentrolla on November 26, 2023, 08:30:09 AMAlmost all f the targets are possible with slight variations as per my personal opinion except for the XRP and Doge. As XRP has not breached it's previous ATH in last 5 and half years and it's too much of an time for any crypto to achieve it this I would say it won't ever breach it, Doge would be good around $1 if there are heavy hype and Elon Musk pull out some magic else difficult. All the other altcoins which you have mentioned has very much possibilities of going beyond the figure especially ETH and BNB (If there ar no further controversies like CZ's acceptance of the crime and getting involved in illegal activities).Solana just as to double from its previous ATH which is possible in the bullrun.I have to agree with this. Doge and XRP are difficult to reach the target while it's easier for BNB, Solana and Matic. The target for BTC, ETH and ADA would depend on how the market moves. We are already at the start of the bull run it's the first few steps that are modest. Every bull had made a much larger all time high for all these coins and the price targets for most are just about twice or thrice of the last bull. Bitcoin was about 70K, the double would be 140K, Solana was $250.So, they are attainable but they should be your last targets as it's better to sell on slabs not to miss a shorter bull.

comments.author: MegameSama
comments.body: btc, eth, bnb, sol and xrp seem quite realistic in the next bullrun, I myself am optimistic in the next ath mentioned above. especially sol, I am very optimistic, yesterday it fell because it was too manipulated by ftx and the market followed suit, now it looks like it will get back on track. BNB is the same way. Hopefully the CZ problem will be resolved quickly so that there will be no more sentiment of investor fear that Binance will collapse, hopefully this never happens, and BNB will touch a new ath again.

comments.author: ivankoh
comments.body: The biggest reality I can say that is likely to happen is Bitcoin = 120k-150k, ETH = 10k-12k, BNB = 1k-1.5k. Altcoin trends will change target selection very quickly. I think we cannot rule out the potential for TON = 30-50, SOL = 500. There are still possibilities of new breakout trends that we need to recognize early to find profits. Of course, it all depends on the capabilities of bitcoin

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Although I've got some from that list that I don't think will reach those prices for the cryptos that you've given. But what I have learned on this market is we're all speculating and we will never the future of majority of these coins. And of course for Bitcoin, it's all possible and that's the highest chance that it will be able to reach that price and even higher. Even if I want to slash some from those list as their prices seems to be high for me based on their current volume and liquidity and also including its supply, I'd apply what I've learned that everything is possible.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Not sure about the others - but bitcoin and ETH seem very realistic. Anything can happen even to XRP or Doge - but don't let other people's assumptions ruin your investment plans, especially when you have done the analysis. Diversification of assets is advisable - but choose those that have good potential and also have real use cases. I'm going for bitcoin and ethereum here - but wouldn't say no to anything else including BNB and so on.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: SPARE on November 26, 2023, 07:54:47 AMHow many of These price tragets are realistically possible in 2025 ? Bitcoin (BTC) : $150,000  Ethereum (ETH) : $12,000   BNB (BNB)  : $1,500  XRP (XRP) : $7     Solana (SOL) : $500                Cardano (ADA) : $9      Dogecoin (DOGE) : $3      Polkadot (DOT): $200  Polygon (MATIC) : $10The only feasible and realistic target from the list is BNB, BNB has been bartered a lot because of the coordinated FUD it suffered from some of these stupid and bought influential in the space and if the price is still less than $250 with all the attacks then for me, it is a good buy, with all the recent pumps, it is only BNB tokens that have not really pumped, if Binance as an exchange still remain number one then $1500 to me is very realistic

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: That's less than two years of waiting and surely there will be some changes in the crypto market as well, Bitcoin will have another bull run that year like how it used to be last 2021, and all of those altcoins have a high chance to increase its price. But if they're not, my recommendation is ETH and BNB or XRP because these are the most controversial altcoins right due to their beep with the SEC and so far they are staying positive throughout their battle and investors are temporarily avoiding them nowadays and with that, it creates a chance for us to buy them at their lowest price right now.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on November 26, 2023, 11:26:47 AMI think the closest to reality there is btc, eth and and bnb. These two are massive coins that can make it possible to gain new ATH. Well bitcoin might go there but the valuation is too high maybe a $100k would be a perfect prediction to that and 10k for eth and as is for bnb. Most projects could be a game changer and other alts in the list might go as well provided that these three first will do the prediction figure and any tokens will follow suit. In the order of profitability and reliability, i think that the crypto coins that you mentioned, starting from bitcoin, at the top, ETH and BNB, are more likely to reach the price Target projected by the OP. There is no limiting bitcoin, to cross $1000 mark, because of the high trust level that investors have about it's coming bull run, a lot of investments are going to pour in, to pump up the price. Then for top altcoins ETH and BNB, bitcoin bull run, will also impact their demands, that will see them increase significantly. Hopefully CZ resignation as binance CEO, will not affect BNB bull run, and increase in it's value, because if it does, then it'll be a shame to have a top altcoins, go under.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: XRP could probably have a difficult time reaching that. They are on the path of recovery after the rough road against the SEC. Investors that supported them are out and some of them might be invested in something else so it will be a long shot for XRP to reach your number. Then there's BNB, a big issue happened recently about CZ so this could somehow ruin the reputation of Binance coin when it comes to investments. However, I still believe it will move up because the usage is still high but not to that extent in 2025. Bitcoin most probably has a higher chance of reaching the amount that you said because of the Spot ETF that is being applied and maybe near the approval of the SEC. Ethereum will do the same and it will boost the value of it. Just watching its market now can tell that it will just keep on moving up even without ETF just yet. Dogecoin, I am negative on that too. Investors are more wiser now in my opinion after the chaos with FTX. They will want something that has a project that will back up their coin. The other coins, I have no idea how their market will move.

comments.author: dionisi
comments.body: Quote from: SPARE on November 26, 2023, 07:54:47 AMHow many of These price tragets are realistically possible in 2025 ? Bitcoin (BTC) : $150,000  Ethereum (ETH) : $12,000   BNB (BNB)  : $1,500  XRP (XRP) : $7     Solana (SOL) : $500                Cardano (ADA) : $9      Dogecoin (DOGE) : $3      Polkadot (DOT): $200  Polygon (MATIC) : $10Matic might reach $10 and bitcoin can also reach that target price. Rest I doubt.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: SPARE on November 26, 2023, 07:54:47 AMHow many of These price tragets are realistically possible in 2025 ?This price seems unrealistic if we consider the current price despite your target price is 2 years from now. However crypto market can go wild to produce that kind of pump enough to hit your target price to all of this.It’s realistic if we consider the pattern of price growth on all crypto cycle but hitting it on the target year is what makes it unrealistic assumption.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: XRP reaching $7 by 2025 is just wild but I'm not going to dismiss that speculation. Maybe it will happen after all cases filed against Ripple are ruled in their favor.I would have to agree with others take on BNB and SOL. Solana has a solid community that will pump this coin and they are probably the best at marketing. BNB will most likely blow up if CZ focuses more on building Binance's "decentralized" infrastructure.

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: During a bull run everything becomes irrational and any random currency increases in price a lot, so I don't doubt anything, but I'll leave my guesses here too, just speculation.ETH: 7k USDBNB: 2k USDXRP: 6 USDADA: 4 USDDOGE: 0.70 USDDOT: 80 USDMATIC: 8 USDan interesting site to imagine values based on market size is: https://thecoinperspective.com

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: the first three will show the result but not the same as indicated in the starting post, for the rest the forecasts are very fantastic. I don’t believe that a doge with an infinite emission can cost 3 dollars, this is beyond the bounds.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: If it is general possibility then any price could be reached as long as demand would allow to do so. As we all know, everything's market value which is dependent with demand, shows no limit. Problem is lack of assurance that all of the displayed market prices would be met for that year. The market prices of crypto are not consistently increasing which could make it or not, or whether how long would it take to be achieved. So what's your move as an investor? Simply hold still if you are capable to so. If you don't have yours then at least find a good entry point then do the same thing which is to sell once you're okay already. Next uear is when Halving is expected to happen which could create enough demand for this industry in general and that includes dramatic increase with crypto's market prices.
